duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet clients and their pets and complete the appointment sign in process.
Assist clients with check-out and handle money, process credit and debit cards, accept and record various forms of payment, and set future appointments.
Answer phone calls from clients requesting appointments, asking questions about the hospital, and requesting medication refills.
Make outbound phone calls to remind clients of upcoming appointments and set appointments for pets due for services.
Understand common vaccination protocols, basic lab tests, common diseases, veterinary terminology, and pet behavior.
Assist in the cleanliness and maintenance of the hospital to ensure a great client experience.
